app.name: Environment Swap
app.long_description:
EnvSwap - Reboots you to the Aroma System Menu
- This app will change your default ENVIRONMENT and the default BOOT TITLE order - It allows you to swap between the Aroma and Tiramisu environments easily - Useful for people who want to run legacy .ELF homebrew, or need to use the Homebrew Launcher-only apps
